tool_description:
This is an UNOFFICIAL Xbox LIVE API. You can use this API to collect data about gamertags, such as profile/played games/game achievement data.

Please visit https://xboxapi.com for more information
name: XboxAPI.com
title: XboxAPI.com

api_list.name: Friends
api_list.description: This is used to fetch a users friend data

api_list.name: Profile
api_list.description: This is used to fetch a users profile data

api_list.name: Achievements
api_list.description: This is used to fetch a users game achievement data

required_parameters.name: game_id
required_parameters.description: This is the game id - Battlefield3 = 1161890128

api_list.name: Games
api_list.description: This is used to fetch a users played games data
